mapper.select: select profile.storedfilename as profile_img, member.userid, review.id, review.rating, review.comments, review.created_at from review left join member on review.member_id = member.id left join profile on member.profile_id = profile.id where review.hospital_id = #{id} order by created_at desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{rowNums} rows only
mapper.insert: insert into review (hospital_id, member_id, rating, comments) values (#{hospital_id}, #{member_id}, #{rating}, #{comments})
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where hospital_id = #{id}
select round(avg(rating), 1) as ratingAvg from review where hospital_id = #{id} group by hospital_id
